name: Hawkins, Inc.
description: Hawkins, Inc. is a leading provider of specialty chemicals and a key distributor of various industrial products. Founded in 1935 and headquartered in Roseville, Minnesota, Hawkins operates across multiple sectors, including water treatment, food processing, and pharmaceuticals. The company has built a strong reputation for its commitment to quality, safety, and customer service. Hawkins engages in the formulation, distribution, and manufacturing of a diverse array of chemical products, including sodium hypochlorite, potassium permanganate, and other specialty chemicals. With a focus on sustainability, Hawkins strives to reduce its environmental impact while providing innovative solutions to its customers. The company’s extensive distribution network allows it to serve a broad customer base, ensuring timely delivery and support for its clients' needs. Hawkins prides itself on its knowledgeable staff and robust technical support, which empower customers to make informed decisions about their chemical needs. Additionally, Hawkins actively invests in research and development to expand its product offerings and improve existing solutions, demonstrating its dedication to innovation and excellence in the chemical industry.
